issue.title: [Python] Ensure that dtype mutation test works on s390x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17030](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17030). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The test for ARROW-17018 fails on s390x. See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13553#issuecomment-1179459567 for details.

comments.body:
